Straight Shot had just made it into the room when she heard Lord Elder ask =
for Tucson.  She knew where to find him, and she readilly raises her hand.
=

"I can do that, I know where he is.  I won't take long, I promise."

She s=
aunters off to find Tucson, but finds that the room has a private code on i=
t.  She narrows an eye in thought and decides to give him a text message wh=
ich she knew would go through to him.

"Lord Elder needs you in the ready r=
oom ASAP.  Something's up.  Straight Shot."

Tucson gets the message in an =
audio fashion.

" I copy that Straight Shot.  Oh well, it was fun while it =
lasted Talon.  Here, come with me, I think it's important and I feel that L=
ord Elder needs to meet with all of us."

He gets to his feet, and offers h=
is hand to Talon, to help her up as well.
